TopicTitle: Feature request: Link to index at bottom of thread page

Articles.Content:
It would be really nice if the bottom of the thread view page would have a link back to the board index, just above the Quick Reply box. For example, if you've scrolled to the bottom of a thread in the Challenges forum, a link back to the Challenges index.

Or possibly just duplicate the path links from the top of the page at the bottom ("Forum -> Other Forums -> KSP Network -> The Forum Forum" for this thread")
